method.name: IsInitialized
method.comment: Prueba si acaso el objeto ha sido inicializado.

method.name: _getlargememoryclass
method.comment: Return the approximate per-Application memory class of the current device when an Application Is running with a large heap. Return -1 in case of sdk < 11

method.name: _getlauncherlargeicondensity
method.comment: Get the preferred Density of icons For the launcher. Return -1 in case of sdk < 11

method.name: _getlauncherlargeiconsize
method.comment: Get the preferred launcher icon size. Return -1 in case of sdk < 11

method.name: _getlocktaskmodestate
method.comment: Return the current state of task locking. The three possible outcomes are LOCK_TASK_MODE_NONE, LOCK_TASK_MODE_LOCKED and LOCK_TASK_MODE_PINNED.

method.name: _getmemoryclass
method.comment: Return the approximate per-Application memory class of the current device. Return -1 in case of sdk < 11

method.name: _initialize
method.comment: Initializes the object. You can add parameters to this method if needed.

method.name: _isbackgroundrestricted
method.comment: Query whether the user has enabled background restrictions For this app. true if user has enforced background restrictions for this app, false otherwise. Return False in case of sdk < 28

method.name: _islowmemorykillreportsupported
method.comment: Whether or not the low memory kill will be reported in Eeturn False in case of sdk < 30

method.name: _islowramdevice
method.comment: Returns true if this is a low-RAM device. Eeturn False in case of sdk < 19

method.name: _isrunninginusertestharness
method.comment: Returns "true" If the device Is running in Test Harness Mode.

method.name: _isuseramonkey
method.comment: Returns "true" If the user interface Is currently being messed with by a monkey. Return False in case of sdk < 8

property.name: _largememoryclass
property.comment: Return the approximate per-Application memory class of the current device when an Application Is running with a large heap. Return -1 in case of sdk < 11

property.name: _launcherlargeicondensity
property.comment: Get the preferred Density of icons For the launcher. Return -1 in case of sdk < 11

property.name: _launcherlargeiconsize
property.comment: Get the preferred launcher icon size. Return -1 in case of sdk < 11

property.name: _locktaskmodestate
property.comment: Return the current state of task locking. The three possible outcomes are LOCK_TASK_MODE_NONE, LOCK_TASK_MODE_LOCKED and LOCK_TASK_MODE_PINNED.

property.name: _memoryclass
property.comment: Return the approximate per-Application memory class of the current device. Return -1 in case of sdk < 11
